display_name: Apnea-Hypopnea Index (Supine): (Apneas with no oxygen desaturation threshold used only with arousal + hypopneas with > 50% flow reduction and with no oxygen desaturation used only with arousal) / hour of sleep in supine position from type I polysomnography
description: Supine Respiratory Disturbance Index (RDI) at all desaturations [(total number of apneas and hypopneas in supine body position) / (hours of sleep)]
calculation: 60*(hrembp + hnrbp + carbp + canbp + oarbp + oanbp + marbp + manrbp)/(remepbp+nremepbp)
